short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk downloader for your Bandcamp purchases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficiently download your Bandcamp purchases with just a few clicks. 

Batchcamp is ideal if you:
ğŸµ Buy multiple releases during Bandcamp Fridays or full discographies
ğŸ§ Want to download your collection in different formats or for offline listening
ğŸ’¾ Need to quickly recover or backup your entire music library
ğŸšï¸ Manage large amounts of music for DJing, research, or archiving

Features:
âœ… Select multiple/all releases from your collection or purchases page
ğŸ”„ Queue and download automatically
ğŸ“Š Monitor download progress in a separate tab
ğŸ” Retry failed downloads or remove unwanted items
âš™ï¸ Customize default download format and concurrent downloads

Usage:
1ï¸âƒ£ Go to your Bandcamp collection or purchases page
2ï¸âƒ£ Select desired releases using the checkbox on each item
3ï¸âƒ£ Click the Download button to start the process

You can also click the "Select All" button to automatically load and select everything, or hold down the shift key and click to quickly select multiple items.

Note: To avoid Chrome's save location prompts, disable 'Ask where to save each file before downloading' in Chrome settings.
